archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0818
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a Fraud Manager I want to ensure all customer or employee accounts changed by a representative of Vodafone are logged and easily accessible to me to review

properties.value: All changes are visible in context of an account/customer. Do you also require a view from a perspective of a selected Vodafone user? Yes. OOTB there is such view in the CRM from the account/customer context.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
